pr_title: xds: use separate LB configs for EDS policy running with different code paths

timeline.message: Define EdsConfig for full LDS flow use case.
EdsLoadBalancer will always receive EdsConfig rather than XdsConfig.
Change to generate EdsConfig in CdsLoadBalancer.
Modified XdsConfig definition to match that in internal proto definition. Changed its usage in XdsLoadBalancer.
Modified usage of XdsConfig in FallbackLb.

timeline.author: dapengzhang0

timeline.bodyText: nit: This field is only used in one place, and can be inlined with helper.getAuthority() there. No need to check nullness of  helper's authority.
timeline.author: dapengzhang0

timeline.bodyText: Why change this behavior? If childPolicyConfigs  is not empty but does not include any registered policy, it should use round robin instead of return a ConfigOrError.
timeline.author: dapengzhang0

replies.bodyText: Confirmed with Mark the behavior change is the correct behavior.
replies.author: dapengzhang0

timeline.message: Removed unnecessary null branch for field that is never null.
